meta.notes: Phase 1 enhancements complete + Document extraction complete: Added pharma keywords taxonomy, therapeutic areas, regulatory compliance tracking, resume version configurations, metrics bank, ATS metadata, executive search firm tracking, and 6 new innovation projects from ChatGPT/Codex histories. Aligned with 2024-2025 executive resume best practices per optimization report.

personal.title: Pharmaceutical Marketing & Advertising Professional
personal.tagline: Versatile life sciences leader with 20+ years of experience spanning three major industry perspectives

summary.short: Versatile life sciences leader with 20+ years of experience spanning three major industry perspectives: Creative Agency, Manufacturer, and Publisher.
summary.long:
Versatile life sciences leader with 20+ years of experience spanning three major industry perspectives:
• Creative Agency: Experience planning, account, and digital project management
• Manufacturer: US brand management; HCP strategy, positioning, and execution across all channels
• Publisher: Media expertise, Rx impact analysis, partnership strategy, ROI modeling, and advanced targeting

perspectives.description: Experience planning, account, and digital project management
US brand management; HCP strategy, positioning, and execution across all channels
Media expertise, Rx impact analysis, partnership strategy, ROI modeling, and advanced targeting

positions.title: VP, Experience Planner
responsibilities: Planned strategic alignment of channel activations and tactic types to brand imperatives and segmentation
Led XP for 9 oncology accounts across 6 clients, spanning HCP and Patient/Caregiver audiences
Optimized CRM programming and performance reporting
Evangelized XP internally to drive awareness, understanding, and integration with agency processes

items.text: Led creation, testing, and deployment of multiple custom GPTs for Biolumina and oncology-focused brands
Developed GPTs using JSON knowledge bases, structured prompt engineering, and API integrations (OpenFDA, DailyMed SPL, RxNorm)
Created internal education materials explaining AI, ML, LLMs, and enterprise privacy/security principles
Helped guide Omnicom's enterprise ChatGPT pilot by evaluating workflows, summarizing feedback, and developing internal-facing documentation
Built a multi-chapter ChatGPT orientation video series ('Byte by Bite') to improve AI literacy across the agency
Explored workflows for integrating GPT with DAM systems to analyze visual themes in assets
Created an AI ideation GPT using AIDA, PAS, FOMO, SCAMPER, FAB, StoryBrand, and more
Assisted in developing AI use case spreadsheets spanning tactical planning, internal communications, HCP/patient content, and operational automation
Built a GPT specializing in oncology HCP customer journeys using JSON-trained data
Developed methodology for evaluating HCP influencers within pharma marketing
Supported client brand initiatives by designing omnichannel, segmentation, CTV/OTT, and experiential congress frameworks
Designed interactive game-based advertising concepts and WebAR strategies with 8th Wall
Contributed to naming and ideation for oncology-branded GPT assistants
Created advanced Google Analytics workflows including regression-based reconstruction of corrupted GA4 session data using server logs
Analysis of session segmentation (HCP vs Patient), including weekend behavior
Quarter-over-quarter and year-over-year comparative models
Advanced bounce rate and session duration monitoring
Session-per-user anomaly detection
Developed a Python program that ingests Excel files, requests date ranges, computes analyses, and outputs reports with graphs
Explored R-based data storage solutions for long-term GA4 datasets
Built Power Query pipelines for data transformation
Analyzed 36,000-row rep-triggered email dataset to understand subject-line performance
Guided the end-to-end design of a reusable DuckDB pipeline replacing one-off Excel scripts
Structured ETL flow across loaders for traffic, downloads, sources, pages, devices, and engagement
Designed VBA tools to batch-export PPT slides to PNG for OCR processing
Built Python + BeautifulSoup website crawlers with URL-structured extraction and repeated-section de-duplication
Created processes for converting heavy PDFs, PPTs, and Word files into lighter JSON/XML structures
Supported SharePoint List exploration as a relational database alternative for message management
Designed Power Automate flows using AI Builder to detect daily mentions and trigger summaries
Provided cross-platform expertise (Mac, Office 365, Adobe Acrobat Pro, Python, R, VBA)
Solved debugging challenges in Python (length mismatch errors, library conflicts)
Ensured secure environments by avoiding Homebrew and managing MacPorts limitations
Evaluated Figma API and Mermaid.js workflows for visualization
Pioneered AI integration with Pharmetheus GPT assistant, democratizing 15+ years of brand strategy insights—first internal AI tool for brand planning at agency
Led Curiosity-Driven Innovation Initiative with 12 team members over 18 months, generating 5 client-facing innovations and fostering culture of continuous learning
Built WebReportingHub analytics platform reducing cross-brand reporting time 60% for 9-brand portfolio using DuckDB and Python automation
Designed ASCO 2025 Congress reporting framework standardizing medical insights delivery across 6 oncology brands, reducing prep time 40%
Created Promo Fingerprint Visualizer for MLR compliance tracking, contributing to 15% reduction in review cycle time

positions.title: VP, Group Account Supervisor
responsibilities: Led multiple tactics comprising a new mini-campaign launch for a leading HIV treatment

positions.title: Team Leader, Sr. Dir., Commercial Clinical Strategy
responsibilities: Managed ~30 strategic deals (those of high investment, exposure, or risk) per year, totaling $30M+ in sales
Supervised direct reports: 3 Assoc. Directors, 1 Analyst
Defined strategy for accounts throughout entire sales lifecycle: ROI modeling, pitch, media configuration, contracting, execution, impact analysis with IQVIA, optimizations, and renewals

positions.title: Director, Commercial Clinical Strategy
responsibilities: Managed strategic pharmaceutical partnerships
Conducted impact analysis with IQVIA
Developed media strategies for clinical brands

positions.title: VP, Project Management, Group Supervisor
responsibilities: PM team served as digital evangelists and solution consultants in addition to handling all brand staffing, finances, and timelines
Drafted and facilitated approval of five $1M+ SOWs per year
Direct reports: 2 Sr PM's, 1 PM, 1 Assoc. PM, 1 BC
Introduced and ran department-wide growth and collaboration efforts to enhance department culture and provide guidance to PMs at all levels

positions.title: Project Management, Group Supervisor
responsibilities: Supervised project management team for pharmaceutical brands
Managed digital project timelines and budgets

positions.title: Senior Project Manager
responsibilities: Managed digital projects for pharmaceutical clients
Coordinated cross-functional teams

positions.title: Marketing Manager - LIPITOR / CADUET
responsibilities: Managed a $10M+ portion of US HCP LIPITOR & CADUET marketing budget to efficiently target print and digital promotion to US healthcare professionals, ensuring alignment to core brand strategies, particularly for LIPITOR as it approached LOE
Pioneered digital solutions new to Pfizer and the industry: EMR-based competitive blunting triggered messaging capability with AllScripts, first-ever branded podcast solution for Pfizer

Brand marketing responsibilities included: Review Committee Marketing Captain, convention management, positioning and new campaign launch, POA rep trainings, savings card, digital multichannel, eDetailing rollout captain
achievements: Pioneered first-ever branded podcast for Pfizer
Developed EMR-based competitive messaging with AllScripts (industry first)
Led digital multichannel transformation for legacy brand approaching LOE

positions.title: Associate Marketing Manager, VIAGRA
responsibilities: Supported VIAGRA brand marketing initiatives
Managed tactical marketing programs

positions.title: Administrative Assistant, VIAGRA
responsibilities: Provided administrative support to VIAGRA brand team
Coordinated marketing operations

professional_interests: Learning and application of Python and SQL

projects.name: Custom GPT Suite for Oncology Marketing
projects.description: Led creation, testing, and deployment of multiple custom GPTs for Biolumina and oncology-focused brands using JSON knowledge bases, structured prompt engineering, and API integrations
outcomes: Improved agency AI capabilities
Enabled oncology-specific HCP customer journey analysis
Created reusable AI framework for client brands

projects.name: Byte by Bite - AI Education Series
projects.description: Built a multi-chapter ChatGPT orientation video series to improve AI literacy across the agency
outcomes: Agency-wide AI adoption
Improved AI understanding and security awareness

projects.name: GA4 Analytics Pipeline with DuckDB
projects.description: Guided the end-to-end design of a reusable DuckDB pipeline replacing one-off Excel scripts for multi-brand analytics
outcomes: Automated analytics reporting
Standardized multi-brand data processing
Improved data accuracy and consistency

projects.name: LIPITOR EMR-Based Competitive Messaging
projects.description: Pioneered EMR-based competitive blunting triggered messaging capability with AllScripts - first of its kind for Pfizer and the industry
outcomes: Industry-first implementation
Real-time competitive response capability
New standard for pharma digital marketing

projects.name: Pharmetheus GPT Assistant
projects.description: Custom GPT assistant integrating with BrandBuilder SQL database containing 15+ years of pharmaceutical brand strategy insights, democratizing institutional knowledge access for brand planners
outcomes: First internal AI tool for brand strategy at Biolumina
Reduced historical insight retrieval time from hours to seconds
Democratized access to 15+ years of institutional brand planning knowledge

projects.name: ASCO 2025 Congress Reporting Framework
projects.description: Standardized 4-pillar reporting structure for medical congress coverage across multiple oncology brands, creating consistent therapeutic area overview, clinical trial analysis, competitive intelligence, and strategic implications sections
outcomes: Consistent reporting across 6 client oncology brands
Reduced report preparation time by 40% through standardization
Enhanced strategic value of congress insights for commercial teams

projects.name: CX Ecosystem Sunburst Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive Streamlit application visualizing complex customer experience ecosystem relationships using hierarchical sunburst charts with dynamic filtering and drill-down capabilities
outcomes: Transformed dense relationship data into intuitive visual navigation
Adopted by team for CX strategy stakeholder presentations
Reduced stakeholder confusion about ecosystem complexity

projects.name: WebReportingHub Multi-Brand Analytics Platform
projects.description: Centralized analytics platform for 9 oncology brand websites using DuckDB for efficient querying of Google Analytics data, providing unified reporting and cross-brand performance benchmarking
outcomes: Unified reporting across $2M client portfolio (9 oncology brands)
Reduced analytics report generation time by 60%
Enabled self-service analytics for account teams
Cross-brand performance benchmarking capabilities

projects.name: Promo Fingerprint Visualizer
projects.description: Compliance analytics tool creating unique 'fingerprints' for pharmaceutical promotional material regulatory review histories, identifying patterns and bottlenecks in MLR review processes
outcomes: Identified compliance bottlenecks across multiple brands
Contributed to 15% reduction in MLR review cycle time through pattern insights
Enhanced regulatory team efficiency and visibility

projects.name: Curiosity-Driven Innovation Initiative
projects.description: Internal workshop series and sandbox environment encouraging team exploration of emerging technologies (AI, automation, visualization) applied to pharmaceutical marketing challenges, fostering culture of continuous learning
outcomes: 12 team members participated over 18 months
Generated 5 client-facing innovations (Pharmetheus, WebReportingHub, others)
Fostered culture of continuous learning and experimentation
Positioned team as innovation leaders within agency
